thread.section_title: Boro Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Long Island City, New York) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: View of Manhattan - Review
thread.title_full: View of Manhattan - Review of Boro Hotel, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Terry W
title: View of Manhattan - Review
text:
We wanted to try New York with a difference, having on previous visits always stayed in Manhattan, LIC offered us the opportunity of being within 10 minutes subway ride but offering a new perspective. The view from the Boro Hotel rooftop was spectacular especially on a night.
The hotel itself offers great value for money with clean rooms and adequate amenities. Simple check in process, breakfast available if required, coffee available in the foyer although no facilities for it in the room, no great hardship.
Absolutely loved the location of this hotel, a glimpse of New York life in Brooklyn.
Would recommend the hotel for those on a budget.
Room Tip: Higher floors have the best city view. See more room tips
